post.text: The rigged system may have helped Hillary Clinton escape criminal charges, but the FBI Director did indict her today for her incredible lack of judgment and honesty. Watch her LIE over and over again. Unbelievable! #CrookedHillary #RiggedSystem

comment.author: Braxton James
comment.text: When you guys start screaming about the criminality of a Draft Dodger/Deserter President and his War Profiteering VP killing more than 4400 of our brothers and sisters over a lie, and demanding jail time, then you can have the moral/ethical high ground to demand justice over 113 emails that didn't constitute a criminal act. #untilthenkindlySTFU.

replies.author: Addy
replies.text: Most Democrats voted for that war puddin head. And it was 30,000 emails, not 113.

replies.author: Braxton James
replies.text: Addy Most Democrats were lied to, Lemming. Ask Scooter Libbey. You know the guy who took the fall for it..and is in jail for it.

replies.author: Braxton James
replies.text: Addy and very selective listening. 113 emails contained references to classified material. She wasn't actually forwarding classified emails.
